评论概述: Returned the item because big  and almost got not refund
评论详情: I returned the item  because was big and never got the refund.Refund was canceled for no reason.After contacting amazon costumer service 3 times adn escalating the issue ,i got only partial refund…Is it supposed to get a full refund when you return the item,right?I just tried it and returned it in perfect condition.Be careful when you order from them.

I am so glad I went ahead and ordered this second blazer! High quality and the fit is perfect! I am 5’6” 149 pounds and I’m between a medium and large in tops, my bra size is 36DD Victoria Secret. I am exactly 41” across my bust with just my bra on. I ordered the Large. If you are bigger then 41” across your bust order the xl.  I did not know if I’d like the gold buttons but I do! The NAVY is sharp looking. There are two Navy colors so be sure to order the one you want. Look at the material description. The lining is silky and nice. I got the NAVY color (after ordering the mauve) and I love it!  Perfect with blue jeans or dress pants. I’m definitely ordering more colors. A blazer can take a blah outfit and turn it into a sharp attire and you can look put together quick!

I recently purchased this blazer and have some mixed feelings. First off, it’s important to note that the sizing is definitely off. 📏🧥 I usually wear an extra large, but this fits more or less like a large. If you decide to buy it, definitely consider sizing up! 📈  The color was also a bit of a surprise. 🎨👀 I was expecting a vibrant money green, but it turned out to be more of a very faded green. While it wasn’t what I anticipated, it’s still a nice shade and I’ve decided to make it work. 💁‍♀️👗  On the positive side, the material is decent and it’s well-constructed. ✂️👍 It’s a stylish piece and, even though it wasn’t exactly what I expected, I’ll still be wearing it and making it part of my wardrobe. 👠✨  Overall, a good purchase if you can adjust your expectations on size and color! ⭐⭐⭐
